experiences.title: Intern Fullstack web Developer
experiences.description: Using Visual Studio Code to develop web applications using Laravel Framework and jQuery, build RESTful APIs to integrate for mobile applications, use WordPress to build websites on demand, and use Paint to create logos and banners for customers. Implement APIs that work well for mobile applications, and build websites on the WordPress platform to meet requirements.

experiences.title: Intern fullstack web Developer
experiences.description: Use Visual Studio Code to develop and maintain web applications using React and Laravel, and develop and maintain a RESTful API to integrate data between the frontend and backend. Improve UI/UX performance, build and deploy RESTful APIs, and enhance system integration capabilities.

experiences.title: Data Entry Clerk
experiences.description: Enter data, verify and update information, and assist with data management-related tasks. Ensure data accuracy, reduce data processing and reporting time, create and maintain spreadsheets and databases to improve work efficiency.
